attributes.contentHtml:
Win statusmontior - open source license says you can edit it,
all of these things you didn't put credit in yourself expect dotto's status monitor, you can't blame a guy for not putting credit if its not against the license or you didn't write it yourself.

StatusMonitor-Server's licensed under the GPL 3.0 license and every change must be publicly available (the license states this). StatusMonitor itself has a footer that says "Copyright @ 2022 <%= companyName %> - Powered by StatusMonitor by DottoXD", and that was removed.
I’m honestly not angry / mad or anything but eh…that’s not a nice thing to do. He’s not using it anymore now so eh.

attributes.title: Luxxy hosting ( free hosting ) - luxxy stealer
